channel.title: Playbook on Incubyte Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Playbook on Incubyte Blog

item.title: Project Kickstart Checklist
item.description: The Checklist Manifesto by Atul Gawande, walks us through the benefits of the humble checklist. He talks about how checklists of “dumb stuff” can save us from disasters in life and death situations.

item.title: One Year Of Pandemic & One Year Of Incubyte
item.description: It all started when— unbeknownst to the world, a series of lockdowns changed the way India Inc.

item.title: Remote Onboarding & Immersion at Incubyte
item.description: Employee onboarding is the important process of introducing newly hired employees to the organisation. It is everything that leads up to the employee’s total immersion into the organisation’s culture.

item.title: Why Incubyte?
item.description: Quality is usually an implicit requirement when it comes to developing software. Users ask for a beautiful UI, outstanding performance, and the functionality they need, but quality is never on the list - it is just expected!

item.title: How We Hire Software Craftspeople
item.description: Any organization is the sum of its people and employees are its main spokespeople. Human capital is our most valued asset.

item.title: Working at Incubyte
item.description: At Incubyte we strongly believe in finding the right talent, helping them to unleash their maximum capacity, and then getting out of their way to let them do what they do best.

item.title: Feedback & Rapid Prototyping
item.description: “No fixed direction remains valid for long” - Extreme Programming Explained by Kent Beck

item.title: Planning & Communication
item.description: One of our primary process goals is to make frequent, small releases of our working software.

item.title: Technology Platforms & Business Economics
item.description: Early in a project, we have to decide which platforms we’ll use. Which platforms depend on our ideas for solving the users' problems.
